About Clovers

Clovers is an online gift shopping platform designed to make every moment special. We provide premium gifts for birthdays, anniversaries, festivals, and other memorable occasions.

Our goal is to deliver a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience with easy navigation, secure checkout, and personalized user features. Customers can explore products, manage carts, place orders, and track their purchases effortlessly.

This project is developed as part of a learning initiative to showcase modern web development skills using React, routing, authentication, and local storage management.

Technologies Used
